thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Liz D'Arcy
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Liz D'Arcy

author: Liz D'Arcy
title: Liz D'Arcy
text: So much fabulous dresses to choose from was the only difficult part of my shopping experience. Customer service dealt quickly with any questions I had. Unfortunately the item I purchased did not fit and had to be returned but the overall shopping experience was excellent and delivery was very quick and also the return pick up was next day from courier. I would for sure use this website again and recommend to others also.
